name: Shape Showdown
description:
Shape Showdown (beta)

Shape Showdown is a little local multiplayer game for 2-4 players.

Its fast paced gameplay makes for some fun times with your friends and family.

DISCLAIMER:
Be aware that the game is still in development. While there should not be any bugs, some features are missing:
• The "Showdown" game mode is not implemented yet
• There is not a pause menu. You have to finish the current game to exit (but I wish you will anyway)
• More content will be added...

CONTROLS:
The basic controls are shown in the game, but if you are not playing with a gamepad (using Keyboard&Mouse) moving is WASD/Arrows, aiming is mouse movement, boosting is right click and hitting the ball is left click.

TO READY UP AT THE BEGINNING OF A GAME PRESS THE BOOSTING BUTTON.
